subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort was built by Maharaja Amar Singh Tomar?
question_hi: महाराजा अमर सिंग तोमर की बनाई गई श्रेष्ठ फोट्ट क्या हैं ?
explanation_en: Maharaja Amarsingh Tomar is known for building the Amer Fort in Jaipur, Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: महाराजा अमेर तोमर के बनाए गए फोट्ट के लिए एमर फोट्ट से क्या बनाया गया है।
महाराजा अमेर तोमर के बनाया गया है।।

subject: Rajasthan History

choice_en.explanation_en: Udaipur is the correct answer as it is the capital city of Jaipur district.

choice_en.subject: Rajasthan History
choice_en.question_en: Which king ruled Rajasthan before Maharana Pratap Singh?
choice_en.explanation_en: Rana Pratap Singh was the king who ruled Rajasthan before Maharana Pratap Singh.
